titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Science and Technology
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/6/2010--Passed House without amendment. Elects named Majority Members to the House Committees on: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Armed Services; (4) Foreign Affairs; (5) Homeland Security; (6) the Judiciary; (7) Natural Resources; (8) Science and Technology; and (9) Transportation and Infrastructure.
